location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.359 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Covering letter enclosing correspondence no.173 (f 169) from the Officiating Secretary to the Government of India, to the Chief Secretary of the Government of Bombay, dated 7 January 1853. In the enclosed letter the Governor General in Council approves of the instructions issued to the Resident in the Persian Gulf by the Government of Bombay, that no further punitive measures need be threatened against the Arab chiefs of the Gulf.
